main event: A report from Project Blue Book documenting a UFO sighting on 14 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as elongated with a greenish hue., The sighting lasted for about three to four seconds., The object was reported to have four or five portholes., An exhaust flame was recorded as one and a half times the size of the object., The sighting was made on a clear night with 12 miles visibility.
sighted object: elongated object with a greenish hue
witness description: 1st Lt. - Security Officer - considers source reliable
